results.title: Association of 1-Year Blood Pressure Variability With Long-term Mortality Among Adults With Coronary Artery Disease
results.text_hl: Although @DISEASE_Hypertension @DISEASE_MESH:D006973 @@@hypertension@@@ is the most prevalent modifiable risk for @<m>DISEASE_Coronary_Artery_Disease</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D003324 @@@coronary artery disease@@@ (@<m>DISEASE_Coronary_Artery_Disease</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D003324 @@@CAD@@@), previous BP variability studies have focused mostly on @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@ without @<m>DISEASE_Coronary_Artery_Disease</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D003324 @@@CAD@@@.

citations.NLM: Dasa O, Smith SM, Howard G, Cooper-DeHoff RM, Gong Y, Handberg E, Pepine CJ. Association of 1-Year Blood Pressure Variability With Long-term Mortality Among Adults With Coronary Artery Disease JAMA Netw Open. 2021 Apr 1;4(4):e218418. PMID: 33914047

results.title: Atenolol and ischaemic heart disease: an overview.
results.text_hl: @<m>CHEMICAL_Atenolol</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D001262 @@@Atenolol@@@ appears to be effective as an anti-@DISEASE_Optic_Neuropathy_Ischemic @DISEASE_MESH:D018917 @@@ischaemic@@@ agent in @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@ with obstructive @<m>DISEASE_Coronary_Artery_Disease</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D003324 @@@coronary artery disease@@@ when reduction in myocardial @CHEMICAL_Oxygen @CHEMICAL_MESH:D010100 @@@oxygen@@@ supply (@DISEASE_Ischemia @DISEASE_MESH:D007511 @@@ischaemia@@@ not preceded by an increase in heart rate and due presumably to functional @DISEASE_Coronary_Stenosis @DISEASE_MESH:D023921 @@@coronary stenosis@@@) or increase in demand are the likely causes.

citations.NLM: Cruickshank JM, McAinsh J. Atenolol and ischaemic heart disease: an overview. Curr Med Res Opin. 1991;12(8):485-96. PMID: 1764953
citations.BibTeX: @article{1764953, title={Atenolol and ischaemic heart disease: an overview.}, author={Cruickshank JM and McAinsh J}, journal={Curr Med Res Opin}, volume={12}, number={8}, pages={485-96}}
